reviews.review:
Portal is an absolute gaming classic.

Despite being over a decade old now, thanks to it's intuitive and simplistic playstyle, yet inventive puzzle solving riddles, it's fair to say the game still holds up very well even by todays standards, with the length of the game being the only thing you could possibly hold up against it.

The game is predominately a puzzle game, where you need to use physics and objects to solve riddles, with a big helping hand from a portal gun, allowing you to switch quickly between two places, and also use momenttum from the switch to launch yourself further than you could normally jump.

Although the game is pretty short, with the main story coming in at just a couple of hours, there are some extra modes available, such as advanced chambers and challenge chambers to help with the longevity, and for those who like to see behind the curtain of gaming, there is also the chance to play through the game again whilst listening to the developers commentary, a feature I personally wished more games decided to utilise.

You are guided throughout the game by GLaDOS, who slowly changes into quite the psychopathic little madam, reminiscent of HAL9000 from 2001: A Space Odyssey, and the small robot turrets have great death animations too.

Overall, even when purchased today, this is still a game well worht your money, even at full price, but with it often being on sale, this should definitely be in your game collection.

Best for: Lovers of dishonest bakers

Portal may be a short game, but I enjoyed every second of it.

This and Portal 2 were definitely worth the less than € 3 I spent on the bundle during a sale.

Some things age well while others die in a year or so. This game is immortal. 
Portal 1 is one of those games that changed the way we interact with video games forever. It's the perfect example of a spark of genius in an industry that is becoming more and more dull, repetitive and an outright rip-off sometimes.

I finished this in 3 hours on offline mode.And I realized Valve has Made a impeccable game.

Carry on GabeN!

Portal ist ein sehr amüsantes Rätsel-Spiel.
Die Rätsel steigern sich in einer angenehmen Geschwindigkeit, wobei in der Story die Rätsel etwas anspruchsvoller hätten sein können. Die Portal Mechanik, who would have guessed, ist sehr schnell erlernbar und damit ergeben sich teilweise einige lustige Situationen/Spielereien. 
Die Story ist recht unterhaltsam und die KI Glados, die uns durch alle Testkammern führt muss man einfach lieben.

Physics simulator with a threat on your life. I love my weighted companion cube.

https://youtu.be/-aujSEPxcMA
Ce jeu est dingue. Il faut y jouer pour comprendre
This game is old but its puzzle platforming still holds as the most complicated experince i can have on here. It holds up over time. A true labor of love.
It's a Fun game but way too short.
Efsane bir seri derslerde kullanmadığım kafayı bu oyunda kullandım inşallah 3. sü çıkar

This is a very impressive game.  I bought it a while back, and I still play it.  The game can still provide a chllenging experience, despite the fact that I have completed it once.  The challenge levels are also impressive.  The storyline is awesome.  I would definitely and have recommended it to others.  The price also tends to be pretty low, making it super inexpensive yet very awesome and fun!  Happy Portaling!
Um jogo bem feito para a época, cheio de puzzles interesantes e complexos sempre utilizando várias mecânicas, incluindo a portal gun que você usa o jogo inteiro.
Probably my second favorite game, after portal 2.
Amazing game, couple of faults, but still one of the best games I've ever played

Проходится за 2 часа. Сюжет раскрывается после прохождения 19 комнаты, а это уже половина игры. Пару атмосферных секреток. Красивая песня в титрах. Больше эта игра из себя не представляет. 
Она не стоит таких денег, лучше брать по скидке, как раз на распродаже. 
Вторая часть намного лучше
Not a bad game but should be longer
Amazing setting and gripping story. I just which I was better at puzzles.
I heard the praise. Growing up everyone's like "oh portal, Half life, blah blah. So good, blah blah blah." And then this games 2.50 on black friday. So i say screw it. And it's actually good.

一起买的先通了2再玩1感觉玩的动力不大，主要是为了走剧情，看看女主和BOSS的纠纷。连干2小时通关，1代的三维弹球玩的我脑瓜子疼，不如二代的激光直白，光子球老是蹭到角就乱跑，再等刷新很耽误时间。对我来说仍然是更喜欢测试室多一点，出了测试室就感觉自己是在玩半条命······难度来看，关卡难度2＞1，但是操作难度1＞2，1代没有凝胶，但是很多地方需要连续瞄准打门对手柄玩家不友好，我手柄蓝门和橙门按键还是反的，而且没有下蹲键，玩到后来钻管道用键盘玩才知道1代有蹲，不用键盘玩我可能一辈子过不去。二代全程手柄。因为有2了，所以1代显得不那么瞩目，如果二代可以附带把1代的关卡和剧情重置一下就太棒了，类似求生之路那样，另外，希望能出portal3，因为这真的是个很棒的游戏，最后，表白GLaDOS，被声音洗脑了
传送门1、2我都玩过，特意入正补票了。对成就党来说，真的好难呐，主线打通了才是刚刚开始，空着那么几个成就心里痒
игра классная, одна из лучших творений VALVE
Its a good game to get, its a nice time consumer, and I mainly recommend getting it when its on sale.
Eins der geilsten rätzelspiele mit freunden macht das übelst fun
Everyone's played this. This deserves the "Most fun with a Machine" award. When valve was amazing.
玩通关二代再返回来玩一代还是一如既往的好玩~
One of the best games ever created
啥都不说了,   玩爆就行
It's very much worth it's reputation

This cake is a lie! 
Meet GLaDOS and Companion Cube in a not so motion-sickness friendly freefall adventure while trying to master the tests of the Aperture Science Enrichment Center...

10/10 would feel sick again!
Всё ёще играбельно. Отличный способ с интересом скоротать вечер.
muy bueno y entretenido parea pasar el rato.
НУ такое. 2 ечера убил и не интересно стало + -
an awesome story filled puzzle game, definitely recommended
游戏挺费脑子的，花了几天通关，最后的Still Alive简直妙
Новаторская игра своего времени. Теперь можно сказать, что это классика.

This game requires a dose of brain and a dose of hand dexterity.
It, in a way, brought me back to my childhood with 8-bit games, that were so hard and tricky, but still aluring enough to keep me going.
Portal is hard and tricky, but with a way better sense of reward than those old platformers.
Just like Half-Life, Portal teases and teaches you in the first few levels, of what is to come later on.
If you like a multi-player puzzle-jump-brain-game, then I'd suggest Portal 2.
It's more of the same and more of more.
Don't believe the hype, the cake is indeed not a lie.
This is by far the best game i played. This and every other review tells you that this game is a masterpiece!
Игра очень хорошая.Много загадок и сюжет тоже отличный, но жаль что так все кончилось грустно.Хорошо что хоть вторая часть есть.)
Не смотря на то что озвучка у ГладОС ужасна, игра сама отлична. Если вам вдруг нечего делать и т.д, то эта игра идеально поможет вам убить время.

穴を開けて入った先でまた穴に落ちるようにPortalを設置すると
無限ループって怖くね？みたいな状態になる。
試行錯誤で穴に入ったり出たりするので酔いやすい人は注意。
セールで購入しましたが、値段以上に楽しめました。
刚开始UI和CS好像，看起来很有感觉，玩的时候还可以弄些骚操作，和朋友一起玩，乐趣无穷。
The cake is in fact 100% a lie.
